features: Real Non Stick Frying Pans - Meticulously crafted with the innovative combination of cast iron skillets and nonstick frying pan set technology. This unique combination not only provides an exceptional nonstick surface but also minimizes the contact area between food and the pan. Ensuring true nonstick performance while extending their lifespan. Say goodbye to stubborn food residue and enjoy effortless cooking and cleaning like never before.

Even Heat Distribution - The high-quality cast iron pan have the advantages of fast heat conduction and even heating. Its excellent heat retention will keep your food warm for a long time. At the same time, the honeycomb better distributes the oil in the pot evenly in the frying pan nonstick of the honeycomb, cooking with less oil helps to reduce fat intake, better exert the characteristics of the ingredients. and improves the health of life and the quality of food. Make omelets so easy.

Ergonomically Detachable Wooden Handle - The rosewood handle is fireproof and scald proof, not chipping or cracking, it greatly provides you with a comfortable grip and effectively avoid the handle from getting hot during cooking, Make your cooking more comfortable and safe. Due to the unique detachable design, you can take it off the handle and put it in your locker at any time. The hole on the pans set for cooking top can also be used for hanging. Save at least 55%+ space for your kitchen.

Suitable For All Stoves - The 8inch non stick frying pan is designed to fit all types of stoves such as ceramic, electric, gas, grill and induction. 12inch is incredibly practical for personal or family use. Cook with confidence as the nonstick frying pans can safely withstand temperatures up to 500°F. Whether you're frying egg, lightly pressure cooking, grilling, etc., the pan for cooking nonstick are perfect for all your culinary needs.

Super Durable & Convenient: The cooking pans is equipped with exceptional durability and rust-proof features, guaranteeing long-lasting non-stick performance without the hassle of frequent maintenance. Enjoy the convenience of lighter pans compared to traditional cast iron skillets, while still maintaining perfect balance with the handle. Bid farewell to tilting and experience maximum stability and security during use.

Easy To Clean & Gift Warranty - The seamless rivet design avoid dirt and grime buildup, Simply rinse with water and mild detergent to quickly remove stains. The non stick frying pan set are dishwasher safe, but hand wash is recommended for maximum longevity. (note: handle should be removed before placing in the dishwasher). We provide a lifetime warranty and 24*7 customer service ensures quick resolution of any issues, High-end gift box making it an excellent choice for personal use or as a gift for friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Imarku Non Stick Frying Pans
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the imarku Non Stick Frying Pans - 8 inch & 10 inch Frying Pan Nonstick Set, Honeycomb Lock Oil Cast Iron Skillets, and I am delighted to share my thoughts on these kitchen essentials. Placing my order on July 24, 2023, I received the pans on July 27, 2023, and my culinary experience has been elevated ever since.First and foremost, the packaging of the imarku frying pans exudes elegance and quality. Upon unboxing, I was immediately impressed with the beautiful design and attention to detail. The pans themselves are visually appealing and emit a sense of high-end craftsmanship.In terms of performance, these pans deliver remarkable results. The even and consistent cooking they offer is truly impressive. From searing to sautéing, the imarku pans excel in providing flawless heat distribution, ensuring that my dishes turn out perfectly every time. Moreover, the two different sizes - 8 inches and 10 inches - cater perfectly to my various cooking needs, allowing me to prepare meals with ease.One feature that stood out to me is the ingenious honeycomb lock oil coating. It not only enhances the non-stick properties but also ensures that the pans require minimal oil for cooking, promoting healthier culinary practices. The non-stick surface is truly exceptional, allowing food to effortlessly glide across the pan without any residue left behind. My morning eggs, in particular, have become a delight to cook as they slide effortlessly onto the plate.The thoughtful design of the pans extends to the convenient handles, which are easy to add and remove as needed. I particularly appreciate the pans' oven-safe feature, providing versatility for preparing a variety of recipes. The pans strike the perfect balance between sturdiness and manageability, as they possess a satisfying weight without being as heavy as traditional cast iron pans.The smaller 8-inch pan has quickly become my go-to choice for everyday use, especially for individual servings or breakfast items. Its compact size and excellent performance have made it an essential tool in my kitchen arsenal.In conclusion, the imarku Non Stick Frying Pans have exceeded my expectations in every aspect. Their exceptional quality, outstanding non-stick properties, and thoughtful design have elevated my cooking experience to new heights. These pans are not only functional and versatile but also aesthetically pleasing, adding a touch of sophistication to my kitchen. I highly recommend the imarku Non Stick Frying Pans to anyone in search of reliable, high-performance cookware that effortlessly brings out the best in their culinary creations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Superb all-rounder set of pans
reviews.reviewText: I picked up this set of pans to replace my worn out non-stick pans. I've owned an iMarku santoku knife for a few years and consider it my favorite knife. These pans advertise cast iron performance without the worries about maintenance, they're dishwasher safe and non-stick but heat evenly and sear well. I didn't quite know what to expect but have been very impressed using them over the past few weeks.The pans are very heavy, and the wooden handles come unattached and require a bolt (with an eye for hanging the pan) to be screwed in. I hang my pans and wasn't entirely clear on how the handles attach, so I had wondered what to expect, but the long bolt has no problem hanging with my other pans. It's relatively easy to screw and unscrew the bolt, which is important because you'll need to remove the real wood handle prior to putting the pan in the dishwasher (or not, but the wood will wear out).I've primarily been using the 10" to replace the pan that was worn out, and I've found that the results are closer to what I expect from a cast iron pan than the usual aluminum or copper-bottom pans I've had for years. Potatoes crisp up well, eggs benefit from the even heat distribution and cooking down onions or peppers hasn't caused any issues with sticking. I found the 8" to be slightly smaller than expected, but perfect for eggs. Given my experience with the knife and the quality and heft of these pans, I expect these to last for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars true non stick pan and cooks even
reviews.reviewText: been looking for a true non stick pan that cooks even and not bow in middle 1st time in use . make this clear I never use over medium heat , no need too. I read and done what they said before cooking . this is cast iron coated , just a tad heavy but good long removeable wood handles ( great for storing ) . 1st I toasted cheese bread with just a little clarified butter come out nice and brown and even cooked . I wiped pan out and then cooked cheese straight in pan no oil or anything and it slid right out with just a nice brown cook as you can see and then I cooked a egg with no oil or butter same way and same results slid right out of pan . I don't normally leave a lot of reviews but if it is worth it I will good or bad . These will last a long time for money and got a 8 inch and a 10 inch for 70 dollars . Very very very easy clean upI am just a old fart who loves to cook , I DO NOT GET PAID TO WRITE THIS !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! but as working people most of us can not afford 200 dollar pans that can be a market gimmick best of luck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We've tried all kinds of pans. Husband is hard on them. Think these will last a long time and he loves them too. Did have an issue with one handle, it wasn't honed properly on the small pan and wouldn't attach no matter how hard we tried. Contacted the company for a new handle asking if I should return the whole set or if they would send a new handle. They replied with the same options I asked them about. So, I exchanged them. The new set handles worked fine. They are heavier than the normal frying pans. They heat up well and evenly. Nothing is sticking after using them for a couple weeks. I did prime them according to the directions. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i am really fascinated to see how strong and solid it is. it is really made up of cast iron that makes it heavy, but also it is coated with non stick material which makes it looks great. Great for everyday use to make different stuff easily. The non stick makes it more easy for cleaning. The best part is it need a very few amount of oil for cooking.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I plan on purchasing more from this company after I have used the pans for a few months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this pan. Combines the aspects of a non-stick pan with cast iron. Very even heat distribution and has some nice weight to it. The long handle is also great for when you are using it on a back burner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My wife's favorite small pan
reviews.reviewText: This pan is excellent. Heavier than the typical non-stick pans. It cooks very well and cleans up nicely. Followed the seasoning instruction and after using for a week it quickly became my wife's go-to small pan for cooking. It looks like I might wind up having to buy her the larger size in the near future.
